name: King of the Jungle (emilyjaynedavison, CralDev, Rosie Summers, yalch1000)
name_original: King of the Jungle (emilyjaynedavison, CralDev, Rosie Summers, yalch1000)
description:
[WebGL Version has not been tested and contains graphical issues]

[Please use the Windows version download below when possible]

XR Games Jam22 - 48 Hour Game Jam

After the Animal Kingdom has enjoyed 100 years of peaceful reign from the Lion, the time has come to declare a new King. Animals have travelled all across the world to come together and fight for the title of King of the Jungle ... via party minigames.

Play as eight cute animal characters fighting for the top spot. 

Featuring a single fun minigame! (stick around to see if we make more) 

Slap your friends to victory!

Required 2 - 4  Players - Local Multiplayer.

---------------------------------

Controller Support

Keyboard Controls: 

WASD to move

Space to Jump

Shift to Slap

---------------------------------

Pudding Credits: 

Carl Waddingham: Programming

Emily Davison: 3D Art

Jon Byles: UI and Audio

Rosie Summers: Animation
